languages.text: "Ефрат осаждают силы Архиврага — значит, там место праведных. Те, кто сомневается и боится, могут отступиться — и дать дорогу истинным сынам и дочерям Его".
"Eufrates II is besieged by the forces of the Archenemy, which means the righteous should be there. Those who harbour doubt and fear may turn aside, and give way to His true sons and daughters."
languages.original_text: "Ефрат осаждают силы Архиврага — значит, там место праведных. Те, кто сомневается и боится, могут отступиться — и дать дорогу истинным сынам и дочерям Его".

languages.text: “欧夫拉茨二号星被混沌大敌的军队包围了，这意味着正义之人必须立刻赶到。至于那些心怀疑虑和恐惧的人，大可闪到一边，给神皇真正的儿女让出道路。”
languages.original_text: "Eufrates II is besieged by the forces of the Archenemy, which means the righteous should be there. Those who harbour doubt and fear may turn aside, and give way to His true sons and daughters."

traits.locale_text: “欧夫拉茨被混沌大敌的军队包围了，这意味着正义之人必须立刻赶到。至于那些心怀疑虑和恐惧的人，大可闪到一边，给神皇真正的儿女让出道路。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Euphrate-II est en proie aux forces du Grand Ennemi, ce qui signifie que les justes doivent s'y rendre pour les repousser. Que ceux qui nourrissent des doutes laissent leur place à Ses véritables enfants. »
languages.original_text: "Eufrates II is besieged by the forces of the Archenemy, which means the righteous should be there. Those who harbour doubt and fear may turn aside, and give way to His true sons and daughters."

traits.locale_text: « Euphrate est en proie aux forces du Grand Ennemi, ce qui signifie que les justes doivent s'y rendre pour les repousser. Que ceux qui nourrissent des doutes laissent leur place à Ses véritables enfants. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «Eufrates II está siendo asediado por las fuerzas del Archienemigo, por lo que los justos debemos acudir. Quienes alberguen duda y miedo en sus corazones pueden apartarse para dejar paso a los verdaderos hijos e hijas del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "Eufrates II is besieged by the forces of the Archenemy, which means the righteous should be there. Those who harbour doubt and fear may turn aside, and give way to His true sons and daughters."

traits.locale_text: «Eufrates está siendo asediado por las fuerzas del Archienemigo, por lo que los justos debemos acudir. Quienes alberguen duda y miedo en sus corazones pueden apartarse para dejar paso a los verdaderos hijos e hijas del Emperador».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「ユーフラテス・IIは渾沌の勢力の力に包囲されている。言い換えれば、正しき者がそこにいるはずなのだ。疑念と恐怖を抱く者は顔をそむけ、皇帝の真の子らに道を譲るだろう」
languages.original_text: "Eufrates II is besieged by the forces of the Archenemy, which means the righteous should be there. Those who harbour doubt and fear may turn aside, and give way to His true sons and daughters."

traits.locale_text: 「ユーフラテスは渾沌の勢力の力に包囲されている。言い換えれば、正しき者がそこにいるはずなのだ。疑念と恐怖を抱く者は顔をそむけ、皇帝の真の子らに道を譲るだろう」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Eufrates II wird von den Truppen des Erzfeinds belagert, die Rechtschaffenen sollten sich also dort befinden. Wer Zweifel und Furcht empfindet, der mag sich abwenden und seinen wahren Söhnen und Töchtern Platz machen."
languages.original_text: "Eufrates II is besieged by the forces of the Archenemy, which means the righteous should be there. Those who harbour doubt and fear may turn aside, and give way to His true sons and daughters."

traits.locale_text: "Eufrates wird von den Truppen des Erzfeinds belagert, die Rechtschaffenen sollten sich also dort befinden. Wer Zweifel und Furcht empfindet, der mag sich abwenden und seinen wahren Söhnen und Töchtern Platz machen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Eufrates II is besieged by the forces of the Archenemy, which means the righteous should be there. Those who harbour doubt and fear may turn aside, and give way to His true sons and daughters."

languages.text: "Eufrates II, Şerbaşı'nın kuvvetleri tarafından kuşatıldı. Yani inançlılar orada olmalı. İçinde şüphe veya korku olanlar geri dönüp O'nun gerçek oğul ve kızlarına yol versin."
languages.original_text: "Eufrates II is besieged by the forces of the Archenemy, which means the righteous should be there. Those who harbour doubt and fear may turn aside, and give way to His true sons and daughters."

traits.locale_text: "Eufrates II, Şerbaşı kuvvetleri tarafından kuşatıldı. Yani inançlılar orada olmalı. İçinde şüphe veya korku olanlar geri dönüp O'nun gerçek oğul ve kızlarına yol versin."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion
